Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package model.movebehaviors

Interface MoveBehavior

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockUpMove, DoubleNoBackMove, MoveDecorator, NoUpMove, OpponentPushMove, StandardMove, SwapWithOpponentMove, UnlimitedPerimetralMove
    public interface MoveBehavior
    Contains the strategies for finding the reachable squares and for moving the builder. Created using the decorator pattern. StandardMove is the standard move behavior, custom move behaviors could decorate the Move Behavior

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      MoveBehavior copyBehavior()
      Clones the entire wrapped behavior chain
      boolean move​(Builder b, Square dest)  
      java.util.Set<Square> neighborhood​(Square src)  
      void reset()
      Resets all behavior chain internal states

    • Method Detail

      • neighborhood

        java.util.Set<Square> neighborhood​(Square src)
        Parameters:
        src - is the starting point of a builder
        Returns:
        the set of squares where he can go

      • move

        boolean move​(Builder b,
             Square dest)
        Parameters:
        b - is the builder we want to move
        dest - is the square where our builder want to go
        Returns:
        a boolean that indicates if the move phase is ended or not (true = continue move phase, false = end move phase)

      • copyBehavior

        MoveBehavior copyBehavior()
        Clones the entire wrapped behavior chain
        Returns:
        A cloned MoveBehavior object, identical to this

      • reset

        void reset()
        Resets all behavior chain internal states
